sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"治疗，医治"之意。
means: treat ： 普通用词，指接受并诊治病人。
heal ： 侧重指治愈伤口、伤痛如灼伤等。
remedy ： 着重用药物对病人进行治疗。

word_mean: 愈合，痊愈：受损组织的恢复

sentence.Network_en: They hope to heal the rift with their father.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们希望能够弥合和父亲之间的裂痕。

sentence.Network_en: You'll mend. The X-rays show that your arm will heal all right.
sentence.Network_cn: 你会康复的。X光照片显示你的胳膊能够较好地复原。

sentence.Network_en: The wounds may heal cleanly or they may ooze a clear liquid.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些伤口可能会利索地愈合，也可能会分泌出一种透明的液体。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hǣlan (in the sense 'restore to sound health'), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch heelen and German heilen, also to whole

entry.def: When a broken bone or other injury heals or when something heals it, it becomes healthy and normal again.

example.ex: Within six weeks the bruising had gone, but it was six months before it all healed...
example.tran: 青瘀在6周内就消退了，但伤却是6个月后才全好了。

example.ex: If they'd operated and pinned her arm at once, she might have healed by now...
example.tran: 如果他们当时马上就给她的胳膊做手术并用钢针固定，她现在可能已经痊愈了。

entry.tran: （感情创伤）愈合;（情感）恢复常态
entry.def: When someone's emotional pain heals, they feel normal and happy again.

example.ex: A year later, she had healed to the point of at least being able to consider a romantic relationship with another man...
example.tran: 一年以后，她的感情创伤已慢慢愈合，至少能考虑和另一个男性开始恋爱关系了。

example.ex: Only by fully experiencing the depth of our pain can we be healed from it and be done with it.
example.tran: 只有充分感受了深切的痛苦，我们才能从中走出，并将它抛诸脑后。

entry.def: If you heal something such as a rift or a wound, or if it heals, the situation is put right so that people are friendly or happy again.

example.ex: Today Sophie and her sister have healed the family rift and visit their family every weekend...
example.tran: 如今索菲和她的姐姐已经和家人和好，每个周末都回家探望他们。

example.ex: The psychological effects on the United States were immense and in Washington the wounds have still not fully healed.
example.tran: 对美国造成的心理影响是巨大的，在华盛顿创伤仍未完全弥合。

means.word_mean: 3. provide a cure for, make healthy again;

sentences.sentence: "The quack pretended to heal patients but never managed to"

Sentence.sentence: Others said that they felted with time to heal wounds.

means.word_mean: (使)愈合, 治愈, (使)恢复健康

sentences.en: The wound has not yet healed.
The surgeon healed the soldier's bullet wound in the leg.
sentences.cn: 医生治好了那位士兵腿部的枪伤。

sentences.en: The long talk healed many of our differences.
sentences.cn: 那次长谈消除了我们许多分歧。

jushi.english: The wound has not yet healed.
The cut will soon heal over.
The surgeon healed the soldier's bullet wound in the leg.
jushi.chinese: 医生治好了那位士兵腿部的枪伤。
